name: Hollow Emblem
description:
Hollow Emblem is a sci-fi metroidvania game.

You arrived in a dangerous unknown world, so in order to escape, your mission is to kill all the enemies and get abilities from the bosses.

This is a submission to the Metroidvania Month 17.

Controls:

[Left and Right Arrows] to move

[Z] to jump

[X] to attack

Special Abilities:

[SPACE] to get inside the slime

[Z + Z] double jump

[S] slam
